gui.controller

Class HandleOrderScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.HandleOrderScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class HandleOrderScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for handling order management operations, such as canceling, confirming, and updating orders.
